original_text: But did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, like unto the abominations of the heathen, whom the Lord had cast out before the children of Israel.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람들의 가증한 일을 본받아

sentences.original_text: But did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여호와 보시기에 악한 행위를 하였으니

sentences.original_text: like unto the abominations of the heathen
whom the Lord had cast out
